peopleAlsoAsk.question: What are the two extremes of value art?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Value The lightness or darkness of tones or colors. White is the lightest value; black is the darkest. The value halfway between these extremes is called middle gray.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: ELEMENTS OF ART: The visual components of color, form, line ...

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the darkest value in art?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Value is one of the basic tenets of art. It refers to how light or dark a color is. For example, white is the lightest value and black is the darkest value.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Value vs. Color - Elevate Your Art

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What are the 7 elements of art value?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The seven elements of art are line, shape, space, value, form, texture, and color. These elements are the building blocks, or ingredients, of art.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Seven Elements of Art | Definitions, Design Principles & Examples
